org.jivesoftware.smack.provider

Class ProviderFileLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jivesoftware.smack.provider.ProviderFileLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProviderLoader

    public class ProviderFileLoader
extends Object
implements ProviderLoader
    Loads the IQProvider and ExtensionElementProvider information from a standard provider file in preparation for loading into the ProviderManager.
